alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 4:38AM MST until January 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Nezperce, Soldiers Meadow Road, Craigmont, Kamiah, and Winchester. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on winter travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
